metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11496 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is a use-after-free in read_stream in stream.c, because decompress_file in lrzip.c lacks certain size validation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-11496` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180528-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180528-1').
